# MTLMathFloatingPointFunctions.fast

**Case**

An indication that Metal uses the fast version of the 32b floating-point math functions.

## Declaration

```swift
case fast
```

## Discussion

This is the default behavior.

## Function sets

- **MTLMathFloatingPointFunctions.precise**: An indication that Metal uses the precise version of the 32b floating-point math functions.

items.description: An indication that Metal uses the precise version of the 32b floating-point math functions.
